mapper.insert: insert into `aeo`.`images` (name, content_type, data, created_at) VALUES (#{image.name}, #{image.contentType}, #{image.data}, #{image.createdAt});
mapper.select: select `index` as `index`, `name` as `name`, `content_type` as `contentType`, `data` as `data`, `created_at` as `createdAt` from `aeo`.`images` where `index` = #{index} limit 1;
